offer_1.title: Date Night Package
offer_1.description: Indulge in a romantic evening with our Date Night Package. Includes a specially curated three-course meal, and a cozy table setting for two. Perfect for anniversaries, birthdays, or any occasion worth celebrating .

offer_2.title: Family Feast Package
offer_2.description: Treat your family to a memorable dining experience with our Family Feast Package. Enjoy a delicious spread of our chef's signature dishes,including appetizers, entrees, desserts, designed to satisfy every palate.

offer_3.title: Celebration Package
offer_3.description: Make your special occasions even more memorable with our Celebration Package. Whether it's a birthday, graduation, or reunion, let us take care of the details while you enjoy a custom-designed menu.
